Bronze Sword.Description: A sword made of bronze that does low damage

Iron Sword.Description: A sword made of iron that does okay damage

Gold Sword.Description: A sword made of gold that does good damage

Diamond Sword.Description: A sword made of gold that does high damage

Bow.Description: A basic bow that does damage from range

Piercing Bow.Description: A piercing bow that does high damage from range

Health Potion.Description: A potion that heals you obviously

Mana Potion.Description: A potion that increases your mana obviously
